Hi Sybil! How's the car restoration going?
It's going well, actually. I finally got the engine running again today!
That's amazing! I bet it sounds fantastic.
It does! But now I'm working on getting the interior looking good.
I can imagine that's a lot of work. Are you reupholstering everything?
Yes, I'm doing the seats and the dashboard. It's going to take a while, though.
Well I know all about time-consuming projects!
Oh yeah? What are you working on these days?
I'm repairing a really old surfboard. It's a classic longboard.
